data.caption: Re-Appointment Of Statutory Auditors And Directors
data.news_body:
Regulation 30 disclosures for:
1. Re-appointment of Statutory Auditors subject to approval of the shareholders
2. Re-appointment of Directors retiring by rotation subject to approval of shareholders
3. Re-appointment of Mr. A. Praveen Kumar Reddy and Mr. Anushman Reddy as Whole Time Directors subject to approval of shareholders
4. Continuation of Mr. V.G. Sekaran as Non-Executiv Director and Independent Director beyond the age of 75 years 
subject to approval of the shareholders
